.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkCommandBufferBeginInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_COMMAND_BUFFER_BEGIN_INFO
* [[VUID-VkCommandBufferBeginInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkDeviceGroupCommandBufferBeginInfo
* [[VUID-VkCommandBufferBeginInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkCommandBufferUsageFlagBits values
****
